homePage.title: Practice and learn new russian vocabulary.

wordDatabasePage.title: Vocabulary count by Category and Group.

finalMessage.message1: Every mistake is a clue about what needs reinforcement. Everything starts somewhere!
finalMessage.message2: A small step is a giant leap. Keep going!
finalMessage.message3: Progress is already being made! Your learning is underway, now! Don't stop!
finalMessage.message4: The effort is already noticeable. Recognition is starting to kick in.
finalMessage.message5: You're getting into the swing of things. Each attempt brings you closer to mastery.
finalMessage.message6: There are signs of progress. Your memory is awakening.
finalMessage.message7: Good effort! Your mind is already starting to connect the words.
finalMessage.message8: Your studying is already showing! The progress is visible. The language is becoming familiar, isn't it?
finalMessage.message9: Almost halfway there. You're very close to a solid performance.
finalMessage.message10: Halfway there! A perfect balance between learned and what's pending.
finalMessage.message11: You've passed half the vocabulary. You're already above average!
finalMessage.message12: It's clear you've studied! Your level is very good, keep it up!
finalMessage.message13: Great progress, you're getting close to total mastery.
finalMessage.message14: Very good work! Few mistakes, great retention.
finalMessage.message15: Excellent level! A few more reviews and you'll be completely proficient.
finalMessage.message16: Very close to perfection. Do you dare to repeat it and get 100%?
finalMessage.message17: Almost perfect! Just a few minor details to polish.
finalMessage.message18: What a level! Your knowledge of Russian is very solid.
finalMessage.message19: One step away from perfection! Very few mistakes, it's incredible!
finalMessage.message20: PERFECT! Congratulations, your performance was impeccable! You have mastered this lesson.
finalMessage.secret: Madre mia willy pero que haces aqui compañero.
